io.micronaut.configuration.hystrix.annotation

Annotation Type HystrixCommand


  • @Documented
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value={METHOD,TYPE,ANNOTATION_TYPE})
 @Around
 @Type(value=HystrixInterceptor.class)
public @interface HystrixCommand
    Applies AOP advise applied to Hystrix.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    graemerocher

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String command
      Same as value().
      String group
      The command group key is used for grouping together commands such as for reporting, alerting, dashboards or team/library ownership.
      Property[] properties 
      String threadPool
      The thread-pool key is used to represent a HystrixThreadPool for monitoring, metrics publishing, caching and other such uses.
      String value
      Hystrix command key.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract String value
        Hystrix command key.

        default => the name of annotated method. for example:

        ... @HystrixCommand public User getUserById(...) ...

        the command name will be: 'getUserById'

        Returns:
        command key
        Default:
        ""

      • command

        @AliasFor(member="value")
public abstract String command
        Same as value().
        Returns:
        command value
        See Also:
        value()
        Default:
        ""

      • group

        @AliasFor(annotation=Hystrix.class,
          member="group")
public abstract String group
        The command group key is used for grouping together commands such as for reporting, alerting, dashboards or team/library ownership.

        default => The @Client ID if found otherwise the runtime class name of annotated method

        Returns:
        group key
        Default:
        ""

      • threadPool

        @AliasFor(annotation=Hystrix.class,
          member="threadPool")
public abstract String threadPool
        The thread-pool key is used to represent a HystrixThreadPool for monitoring, metrics publishing, caching and other such uses.
        Returns:
        thread pool key
        Default:
        ""

      • properties

        @AliasFor(annotation=Hystrix.class,
          member="commandProperties")
public abstract Property[] properties
        Returns:
        Additional command specific Hystrix properties
        See Also:
        HystrixCommandProperties
        Default:
        {}
